item.description:

  • City: TUALATIN

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER DISCOVERED PACKAGE IN MEZZENINE CLERCKS STATION ON CART LEAKING. RESPONDER LOOKED IN BOX, LEAKING POWDER, FOLLOWED DECICSION TREE AND CONTAINMENT PAGE, ASKED CORDNATOOR FOR INSTRUCTION. INSTRUCTED TO DMP PRODUCT. PRODUCT HAD LOOSE CAP.

item.title: Report E-2025010135
item.description:
Report E-2025010135

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-17T06:18:47+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-12-18
  • City: CLACKAMAS
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 1546 ET, Melody Osleger with XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release/refusal at terminal UPO. It was reported that an unknown amount of UN1824 Instant Power released from 3) 1-liter jugs due to reasons unknown. The cargo was delivered to consignee in good condition but at a later date refused. The release impacted the box. The terminal used a 55-gallon poly drum for the waste prior to notifying ERTS.
